What is the role of acetic acid in the synthesis of ZnTPyP-1?
data.answer: It acts as a monodentate ligand and chelates with zinc ion, promoting an interpenetrated structure.

data.question: Is the effective thickness of the sample (Leff) considered in calculating the nonlinear optical parameters?

What is the significance of the ligand-to-ligand charge transfer (LLCT) in ZnTPyP-1?
data.answer: It is responsible for enhancing the nonlinear optical limiting effect of ZnTPyP-1.
